localhost

respond "hello from localhost"
tls {
	client_auth {
		mode request
		trust_pool inline {
			trust_der 
		}
		trusted_leaf_cert_file ../caddy.ca.cer
	}
}
----------
{
	"apps": {
		"http": {
			"servers": {
				"srv0": {
					"listen": [
						":443"
					],
					"routes": [
						{
							"match": [
								{
									"host": [
										"localhost"
									]
								}
							],
							"handle": [
								{
									"handler": "subroute",
									"routes": [
										{
											"handle": [
												{
													"body": "hello from localhost",
													"handler": "static_response"
												}
											]
										}
									]
								}
							],
							"terminal": true
						}
					],
					"tls_connection_policies": [
						{
							"match": {
								"sni": [
									"localhost"
								]
							},
							"client_authentication": {
								"ca": {
									"provider": "inline",
									"trusted_ca_certs": [
										""
									]
								},
								"trusted_leaf_certs": [
									""
								],
								"mode": "request"
							}
						},
						{}
					]
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
